title: Dark rain
creator_credit: Jack Gardiner, John Kingsford-Smith and Kingcroft Productions
brief_description: The work of the Hunter Valley Research Foundation in investigating causes and the remedies for erosion, floods and drought in the Hunter River Valley, and the silting of Newcastle Harbour. Dams such as the Glenbawn will control the river and provide more water for irrigation. Indicates the effect on primary production.
